name: Drive Zombie Maze
description:
It is a game to escape the mysterious maze while avoiding zombies.

It is a system to escape the maze while driving a car.

Since it is a trial version, you can play 2 stages.

There is a free product version of Google Play, so play it if you find it interesting. The product version currently has 20 stages, but we plan to increase the number of stages.

Method of operation

Operate the car by pressing various buttons and aim for the goal. If you reach your goal for the time being, you're done. Zombies can be disassembled with grenades. Do not touch the zombies. Destroy all zombie generators and finish in time to earn a star.
